summary:
Ophthalmology is a medical specialty focusing on eye health. Ophthalmologists are doctors who specialize in eye care, including diagnosis and treatment. They complete medical school and then extra training in eye care. This training can include general medicine and surgery before specializing in eye-related issues.

These specialists can prescribe medicine, use laser therapy, and perform surgery. They offer general and specialized eye care, and many also do research to improve our understanding of eye diseases. Ophthalmology has a history of leading the way in eye-care innovations.
title: Ophthalmology
